text: Per Mats Ola Carlsson (born 28 January 1961) is a Swedish former footballer who most notably played as a right-back for IFK Göteborg. Carlsson helped IFK Göteborg win the 1986–87 UEFA Cup, playing the full 180 minutes as a right- back in the two final games against Dundee United. He was also a part of the IFK Göteborg that won the 1987 Swedish Championship title. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! rowspan="2" |Division ! colspan="2" |League ! colspan="2" |Svenska Cupen ! colspan="2" |Other[a] ! colspan="2" |Friendlies ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="4" |IFK Göteborg |1986 |Allsvenskan |16 |1 |4 |0 |8 |0 |9 |0 |37 |1 |- |1987 |Allsvenskan |21 |0 |1 |0 |12 |0 |10 |0 |44 |0 |- |1988 |Allsvenskan |3 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |13 |3 |16 |3 |- ! colspan="2" |Club totals !40 !0 !6 !0 !20 !0 !32 !3 !97 !4 |} [a] Appearances in both UEFA competitions and the Allsvenskan play-offs. == Honours == IFK Göteborg * Swedish Champion: 1987 * UEFA Cup: 1986–87 == References == Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Swedish footballers Category:IFK Göteborg players
